## Faculty

### Core Faculty

::: {layout="[[30, 70]]"}

![](./media/Ed.jpg)

**[Edward Kavazanjian, Jr.](https://isearch.asu.edu/profile/742158)**\
Ph.D., P.E., D.GE, NAE\
Regents Professor, Director of CBBG\
**Research Interests:** Biogeotechnical engineering, ground improvement, geotechnical earthquake engineering, waste containment system design, mechanical properties of municipal solid waste\
**Teaching:** CEE 552, CEE 557, CEE 559\
::: {.cell-output-display}

**[Claudia Zapata](https://isearch.asu.edu/profile/27053)**, Ph.D., P.E.\
Associate Professor, Deputy Director of CBBG\
**Research Interests:** Geotechnical engineering, environmental effects in pavement design\
**Teaching:** CEE 452, CEE 553, CEE 554, CEE 598
:::

::: {layout="[[30, 70]]"}

![](./media/Leon.jpg)

**[Leon A. van Paassen](https://isearch.asu.edu/profile/3002885)**, Ph.D.\
Associate Professor\
**Research Interests:** Engineering geology, geotechnical and geo-environmental engineering, environmental biotechnology, soil mechanics, ground improvement\
**Teaching:** CEE 351, CEE 494, CEE 598
:::

::: {layout="[[30, 70]]"}

![](./media/Julian.jpg)

**[Julian Tao](https://isearch.asu.edu/profile/3333500)**, Ph.D.\
Associate Professor\
**Research Interests:** Bioinspired burrowing mechanisms, bioinspired geosystems, smart and sustainable geosystems, soil behavior\
**Teaching:** CEE 452, CEE 550, CEE 494/598
:::

::: {layout="[[30, 70]]"}

![](./media/Hamed.png)

**[Hamed Khodadadi Tirkolaei](https://isearch.asu.edu/profile/2623100)**, Ph.D.\
Assistant Professor\
**Research Interests:** Sustainable Geotechnics, Biogeotechnical Engineering, Ground Improvement\
**Teaching:** CEE 351, CEE 554

:::


## Research Professors

![](./media/Nasser.jpg)

**[Nasser Hamdan](https://isearch.asu.edu/profile/9649)**, Ph.D.\
Assistant Research Professor\
Director of Industrial Collaboration, CBBG
**Research Interests:** Biogeotechnical engineering for ground improvement, Biogeochemical processes, Biopolymers, Mineral precipitation in soils, Geomicrobiology\

Education Director, CBBG
**Research Interests:** Engineering Education\

![](./media/Jafar.png)

**[Jafar Razmi](https://isearch.asu.edu/profile/3497830)**, Ph.D.\
Research Professor\
**Research Interests:** Material behavior, infrastructural design and behavior under transportation, environmental, and other dynamic loads in geotechnical engineering.\
**Teaching:** CEE 555
:::

**Teaching:** CEE 494/598
